description: Follow radio commentary as Welsh Fire host Manchester Originals in the 2023 Women's Hundred.
title: The Hundred 2023: Welsh Fire v Manchester Originals in women's competition
title_page: The Hundred 2023: Welsh Fire v Manchester Originals in women's competition - start delayed by rain - BBC Sport
maintext:
Match abandoned
The inevitable has happened in Cardiff and the match in the women's competition between Welsh Fire and Manchester Originals has been abandoned.
The sides are shaking hands on the boundaries - hoods very much up. They get a point each for their troubles.
Next up are two games scheduled for 3pm - a game between the men's editions of these teams in Cardiff and London Spirit versus Oval Invincibles in the women's competition at Lord's.
The forecast doesn't look great in either location, we'll keep you updated.
Goodbye for now.
Start delayed by rain
It's a drizzly start to the day in Cardiff and the start of The Hundred for Welsh Fire and Manchester Originals has been delayed.
We'll keep you updated with any changes in conditions, but it's looking pretty wet out there.
